description:
Move through mountainous terrain with confidence. The versatile Rapid Mid sits somewhere between a hiking shoe and approach shoe, at home on single track or slabby scrambles. The forefoot insert acts as a rock plate and adds stability when edging on steep approaches. The hybrid lugged outsole provides reliable traction wherever your adventure takes you.

  • Upper made from engineered mesh, synthetic leather and TPU overlays in high-wear areas
  • Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® membrane lets you tackle wet conditions
  • Orthite insole cushions underfoot
  • Dual-density EVA midsole with TPU arch for torsional stability
  • Forefoot Dynamic Protection Insert adds rigidity
  • Rubber toe rand to protect against stumps, rocks, and other kickable objects
  • Vibram® Megagrip rubber outsole with climbing zone at toe for better edging
name: Scarpa Rapid Mid Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Men's
